title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Designing Modern Educational Transformations of Traditional Folk Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Prospective teachers can design three or more transformation strategies to reinterpret folk elements in modern childhood education contexts.
Learners can develop experiential educational activities using traditional cultural materials by applying art-based problem-solving stages.
Participants can analyze the educational potential of folk artifacts and create age-specific instructional materials.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
